query.sql: select * from rdb_rep.from_gl order by repl_date desc, owner
select * from rdb_rep.from_GL_TABLES where id = :ID

SELECT TRUNC (repl_date) dt, SUM(insert_cnt)+SUM(delete_CNT)+SUM(UPDATE_CNT) trans_all, sum (INSERT_BAD_CNT)+sum (DELETE_BAD_CNT)+ sum (UPDATE_BAD_CNT) TRANS_bad, (SUM(insert_cnt)+SUM(delete_CNT)+SUM(UPDATE_CNT))-(sum (INSERT_BAD_CNT)+sum (DELETE_BAD_CNT)+ sum (UPDATE_BAD_CNT)) trans_good from RDB_REP.from_GL group by trunc (repl_date) order by 1 desc

SELECT TRUNC (repl_date) dt, owner, SUM (insert_cnt) inss_all, sum (INSERT_BAD_CNT) inss_bad, SUM (insert_cnt)-sum (INSERT_BAD_CNT) ins_good, SUM (delete_CNT) dels_all, sum (DELETE_BAD_CNT) dels_bad, SUM (delete_CNT)-sum (DELETE_BAD_CNT) dels_good, SUM (UPDATE_CNT) upds_all, sum (UPDATE_BAD_CNT) upds_bad, SUM (UPDATE_CNT)- sum (UPDATE_BAD_CNT) upd_good from RDB_REP.from_GL WHERE TRUNC (repl_date) = : DT group by trunc (repl_date),owner order by 1 desc

SELECT c.id, c.cdate, c.owner,c.table_name, m.message FROM RDB_REP.REP_AUDIT_COP_MESSAGES_ARCH M, RDB_REP.REP_AUDIT_COP_ARCH C WHERE C.ID_REPL = M.ID_REPL AND C.CDATE > sysdate-5 order by c.cdate desc

select trunc(repl_date),owner,table_name, SUM (insert_cnt) inss_all, sum (INSERT_BAD_CNT) inss_bad, SUM (insert_cnt)-sum (INSERT_BAD_CNT) ins_good, SUM (delete_CNT) dels_all, sum (DELETE_BAD_CNT) dels_bad, SUM (delete_CNT)-sum (DELETE_BAD_CNT) dels_good, SUM (UPDATE_CNT) upds_all, sum (UPDATE_BAD_CNT) upds_bad, SUM (UPDATE_CNT)- sum (UPDATE_BAD_CNT) upd_good from rdb_rep.from_GL_TABLES join RDB_REP.from_GL using(id) group by trunc(repl_date),owner, table_name order by 1 desc,2
select * from RDB_REP.REP_AUDIT_COP
select distinct dest_srv DST, 'net use \\172.16.99.17\tii /user:localhost\tii byntuh2njh & xcopy \\172.16.99.17\tii\prom .\tii\prom /z' cmd from repadmin.DIR_LIST_ROBO_p
select d.*,'xcopy \\'||d.PATH||' \\'||DEST_SRV||'\tii\prom /z' cmd from repadmin.DIR_LIST_ROBO_p d where dest_srv =:DST
select distinct dest_srv DST,'net use \\172.16.99.17\tii /user:localhost\tii byntuh2njh & xcopy \\172.16.99.17\tii\asu_ed2 .\tii\asu_ed2 /z' cmd from repadmin.dir_list_robo_b
select d.*,'xcopy \\'||d.PATH||' \\'||DEST_SRV||'\tii\asu_ed2 /z' cmd from repadmin.DIR_LIST_ROBO_b d where dest_srv =:DST
select * from log.v_schema_stat_report_byt@gl5 where "Proc_state" <> 'OK'
select * from log.v_schema_stat_report_prom@GL5 where "Proc_state" <> 'OK'

select * from (select name,type,sum(ora_hash(regexp_replace(replace(text,' OPT_PARAM(''optimizer_features_enable'',''11.2.0.4'') ',''),' [\|//]\*\+[[:space:]]?BYT_(\d{1,3})[[:space:]]?\*[\/|\]',''))) HS from dba_source@MES_125 where owner='BYT_125' and name not like '%$%' and type not like 'TYPE%' group by owner,name,type minus select name,type,sum(ora_hash(regexp_replace(replace(text,' OPT_PARAM(''optimizer_features_enable'',''11.2.0.4'') ',''),' [\|//]\*\+[[:space:]]?BYT_(\d{1,3})[[:space:]]?\*[\/|\]',''))) from dba_source where owner='BYT_100' and name not like '%$%' and type not like 'TYPE%' group by owner,name,type)

select rownum,a.* from ( SELECT a.server sour ,a.towner,b.server dest,b.towner towner_dest,b.tname tname,a.dt_ddl dt_ddl1,b.dt_ddl dt_ddl2 FROM repadmin.ddl_hash A,repadmin.ddl_hash b WHERE A.Towner='BYT_08' AND a.server='GL3' AND B.TOWNER like 'BYT_%' AND B.TOWNER<>'BYT_NSI' AND A.Tname=b.Tname AND a.tname not in ('BYT_REPL_COP','ACC_LKK_BYT') and b.server<>'TEST_SRV3' AND A.ddl_hash<>b.ddl_hash AND A.dt_ddl>SYSDATE-4 AND b.dt_ddl>SYSDATE-4 and b.towner not like 'BYT_40_' and not regexp_like(b.server,'(GAMMA)|(ALPHA2)') AND b.tname not in ('BYT_CONSUMPTION_TMP') ORDER BY b.server,b.towner,b.tname) a

SELECT b.server "Сервер",b.towner "Схема",b.tname "Таблица",b.dt_ddl "Время сбора" FROM repadmin.ddl_hash A,repadmin.ddl_hash b WHERE A.Towner='BYT_08' AND a.server='MES_08' AND B.TOWNER like 'BYT%' AND B.TOWNER<>'BYT_NSI' AND A.Tname=b.Tname AND B.server not in ('BYT_401','CENTR','DELTA') and b.tname not in ('ACC_LKK_BYT','BYT_CONSUMPTION_TMP') AND A.ddl_hash<>b.ddl_hash AND A.dt_ddl>SYSDATE-4 AND b.dt_ddl>SYSDATE-4 and b.server=:SRV ORDER BY b.server,b.towner,b.tname

SELECT distinct b.server SRV,b.towner SCHM FROM REPADMIN.DDL_HASH A,REPADMIN.DDL_HASH B WHERE A.TOWNER='PROM_181' AND A.SERVER='PROM_181' AND B.TOWNER like 'PROM%' AND B.TOWNER<>'PROM_NSI' AND A.Tname=b.Tname AND B.SERVER NOT IN ('BYT_401','CENTR','DELTA') AND A.DDL_HASH<>B.DDL_HASH AND A.DT_DDL>SYSDATE-4 AND B.DT_DDL>SYSDATE-4 ORDER BY 1

SELECT b.server "Сервер",b.towner "Схема",b.tname "Таблица",b.dt_ddl "Время сбора" FROM REPADMIN.DDL_HASH A,REPADMIN.DDL_HASH B WHERE A.TOWNER='PROM_181' AND A.SERVER='PROM_181' AND B.TOWNER like 'PROM%' AND B.TOWNER<>'PROM_NSI' AND A.Tname=b.Tname AND B.SERVER NOT IN ('BYT_401','CENTR','DELTA') AND A.DDL_HASH<>B.DDL_HASH AND A.DT_DDL>SYSDATE-4 AND B.DT_DDL>SYSDATE-4 and b.server=:SRV ORDER BY b.server,b.towner,b.tname
select * from log.patch_control_hist where error_msg is not null order by dt_change desc
select id_kng from byt_nsi.byt_kniga where nm_kng=:NM_KNG

with t as (select /*+materialize*/ * from ( SELECT --a.ROWID, a.server sour, a.towner schema, a.tname table_name, a.COUNT, --a.hash, a.dt, a.dt_cnt, b.server dest, b.COUNT count_dest, --b.hash hash_dest, b.dt dt_dest, b.dt_cnt dt_cnt_dest, CASE WHEN a.hash <> b.hash THEN b.COUNT - a.COUNT END cnt_comp FROM repadmin.hash a, repadmin.hash b WHERE a.towner = b.towner AND a.tname = b.tname AND a.server <> b.server AND ( (a.hash <> b.hash OR a.dt IS NULL OR b.dt IS NULL) OR b.COUNT IS NULL OR a.COUNT IS NULL) AND (a.server LIKE 'MES%' OR a.server LIKE 'PROM%') AND a.towner LIKE 'PROM%' AND b.server IN ('HP01') AND ABS (a.dt - b.dt) < 1 AND a.dt > SYSDATE - 2 )) select t.*,'start /B call 1_schema.cmd '||schema||' '||DEST||' '||schema||' '||SOUR||' HASH -i="'||TABle_name||'"' HPtoMES from t ORDER BY dest, sour, schema, table_name
select * from dba_objects a where status<>'VALID' and (owner like 'BYT%' or owner like 'PROM%' or owner = 'LK_JUR') and not regexp_like(owner,'\d{1}R$')

SELECT DISTINCT dblink, dt, hst, err, tag FROM export_log RIGHT OUTER JOIN dba_repsites ON hst=dblink WHERE regexp_like(dblink,'_\d{1,3}$') AND (dt IS NULL OR err = 'ERROR' OR DT < TRUNC(SYSDATE-7)) AND (tag <> 'day' OR tag IS NULL)

SELECT DISTINCT dblink, dt, hst, err, tag FROM export_log RIGHT OUTER JOIN dba_repsites ON hst=dblink WHERE regexp_like(dblink,'_\d{1,3}$') AND (dt IS NULL OR err = 'ERROR' OR DT < TRUNC(SYSDATE-1)) AND (tag <> 'week' OR tag IS NULL) and dblink not in ('MES_08') --no free space
select server,dt,dt_log,dt_week_log,errors,errors_week from repadmin.backup_monitor where dt<sysdate-2 or dt_week_log<sysdate-7 or dt_log<sysdate-3

select distinct dblink,host,length,tag,lastwritetime,result from dba_repsites@gl5 left join REPADMIN.DUMPS on host=dblink where regexp_like(dblink,'_\d{1,3}$') and (result <> 'Ok' or (to_date(lastwritetime, 'dd.mm.rrrr hh24:mi:ss') < trunc(sysdate)-1 and tag='day') or (to_date(lastwritetime, 'dd.mm.rrrr hh24:mi:ss') < trunc(sysdate,'WW') and tag='week') or lastwritetime is null) order by 1
SELECT * FROM export_obj a LEFT OUTER JOIN export_log b ON a.obj = b.sch WHERE day = '1'
SELECT obj,weekly,dt,sch,err,week FROM export_obj a LEFT OUTER JOIN export_log b ON a.obj = b.sch WHERE week = 1
select * from bulk_calc_monitor where dt_start>sysdate-7 order by dt_start desc nulls last

SELECT RTRIM (SUBSTR (REGEXP_SUBSTR (vl_params, 'nm_schema: [^,]+,', 1, 1), 12), ',') nm_schema, vl_prc, vl_elapsed, vl_remain, dt_start, dt_end, vl_speed, cnt_total, cnt_processed, cnt_success, id_task, nm_program, nm_comment, task_name, task_status, vl_params, id_status, nm_msg, kd_system FROM bulk_calc_monitor WHERE dt_start > SYSDATE - 3 ORDER BY dt_end DESC NULLS FIRST, dt_start DESC NULLS LAST
SELECT server,invalid_obj_num,invalid_ind_num FROM LOG.SERVER_STAT order by 3 desc,2 desc

select sname , PUSH_COUNT, QCMD_COUNT AQCALL, QCMD_COUNT-(select QCMD_COUNT from log.repl_stat_report as of timestamp (sysdate-15/24/60 ) where sname=a.sname)aq_15, AQ_ERROR, JOB_COUNT||'/'||JOB_FROZ_COUNT||'/'|| JOB_BAD_COUNT jobs_brok_long, BLOCK_COUNT||'/'||KILLED_COUNT blocked_killed, TERM_COUNT, PROC_COUNT, CNT_DEST, DESTS, DT_CHANGE from log.repl_stat_report a order by sname

select rownum,a.server,a.towner schema,a.tname table_name,a.count,a.dt_cnt,b.server dest,b.count,b.dt_cnt dt_cnt_dest, case when a.count<>b.count then b.count-a.count end cnt_comp from repadmin.hash a ,repadmin.hash b where a.towner=b.towner and a.tname=b.tname and a.server <> b.server and ((a.count<>b.count or a.dt_cnt is null or b.dt_cnt is null) or b.count is null or a.count is null) and (a.server like 'GAMMA2' ) --and a.server=a.towner and b.server in ( 'GAMMA12')--,'BYT','SBYT') and a.tname not in ('ACC_LKK_BYT','ACC_DELLOG') and abs(a.dt_cnt-b.dt_cnt) <0.5 and a.dt_cnt>sysdate-2 order by b.server,a.server,a.towner,a.tname

select status, cnt ,round(100* (ratio_to_report(cnt) over () ),3) procent from ( select 'bad' status, count(*)cnt from ( select rownum,a.server,a.towner schema,a.tname table_name,a.count,a.dt_cnt,b.server dest,b.count,b.dt_cnt dt_cnt_dest, case when a.count<>b.count then b.count-a.count end cnt_comp from repadmin.hash a ,repadmin.hash b where a.towner=b.towner and a.tname=b.tname and a.server <> b.server and ((a.count<>b.count or a.dt_cnt is null or b.dt_cnt is null) or b.count is null or a.count is null) and a.server in ( 'GAMMA2') and b.server in ( 'GAMMA12') and a.tname not in ('BYT_REPL','BYT_REPL_COP','ACC_LKK_BYT','ACC_DELLOG') and abs(a.dt_cnt-b.dt_cnt) <0.5 and a.dt_cnt>sysdate-2 ) union all select 'good',count(*) from ( select rownum,a.server,a.towner schema,a.tname table_name,a.count,a.dt_cnt,b.server dest,b.count,b.dt_cnt dt_cnt_dest, case when a.count<>b.count then b.count-a.count end cnt_comp from repadmin.hash a ,repadmin.hash b where a.towner=b.towner and a.tname=b.tname and a.server <> b.server and ((a.count=b.count or a.dt_cnt is null or b.dt_cnt is null) or b.count is null or a.count is null) and a.server in ( 'GAMMA2') and b.server in ( 'GAMMA12') and a.tname not in ('BYT_REPL','BYT_REPL_COP','ACC_LKK_BYT','ACC_DELLOG') and abs(a.dt_cnt-b.dt_cnt) <0.5 and a.dt_cnt>sysdate-2 ))

select * from log.server_stat where byt_hash <> ( select byt_hash from log.server_stat where server = 'NSI_MAIN' ) and server not in ('CENTR', 'BYT_401', 'BYT_405', 'SESK', 'MCP', 'ALPHA', 'MES_206_2','DELTA','MAIN','MAIN11')

connect repadmin/rep095@gl5 select server_name,drive_name,free_space/1024/1024 from log.hdd_freespace where (server_name,dt_change) in (select server_name,max(dt_change) from log.hdd_freespace group by server_name) and free_space/1024/1024 < :SPACE order by 3 desc;

SELECT TRUNC(MAX(TIMESTAMP),'hh24') from STRMADMIN.HIST union all SELECT TRUNC(MAX(MT),'hh24') FROM (SELECT MAX(TIMESTAMP) MT FROM SYS.ALL_TAB_MODIFICATIONS HAVING regexp_like(TABLE_OWNER,'(BYT)|(PROM)') AND TABLE_NAME NOT LIKE 'HEARTBEAT' GROUP BY table_owner, TABLE_NAME )
select * from repadmin.error_log where err_dttm > sysdate - 1 order by err_dttm desc

select /*+parallel (a 15) */ eventtime,testname,reply_num/1024/1024 mb from log.hmlog a where eventtime>=sysdate-1 and eventtime<sysdate and reply_num<>0 and testname like 'GL5%u01%' order by eventtime

SELECT TRUNC(add_months(sysdate,-1),'mm') DT_ST, last_day(TRUNC(add_months(sysdate,-1),'mm')) DT_FIN, owner OWNER, SUM(bytes/1024/1024) "traff MB" FROM LOG.WG7 WHERE DT between TRUNC(add_months(sysdate,-1),'mm') and last_day(TRUNC(add_months(sysdate,-1),'mm')) GROUP BY owner ORDER BY 4 DESC
select url,sum(bytes/1024/1024) "traff MB" from LOG.WG7 where owner =:OWNER and DT between :DT_ST and :DT_FIN group by url order by 2 desc

SELECT /*+ parallel(lg,16)*/ REGEXP_REPLACE (url, '(.*//)([^/]*)/?.*', '\2') SITE, SUM (bytes)/1024/1024 FROM LOG.WG7 lg where DT> trunc(sysdate) GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE (url, '(.*//)([^/]*)/?.*', '\2') order by 2 desc
--conn repadmin/rep095@gate2 select ip,owner,round(bytes/1024/1024,2) MB,lim, DT from log.WG7_TRAFFIC where lower(owner) like '%'||:name||'%';
select trunc(dt_reg,'mm') dt,sum(cnt2)pok,sum(cnt) abont from report.byt_lkk_pok_mv group by trunc(dt_reg,'mm') order by trunc(dt_reg,'mm')

SELECT name, LAST_REFRESH FROM dba_snapshots WHERE name IN ( 'BYT_LKK_ALL_MV', 'BYT_LKK_POK_MV', 'PROM_ABONT_CONTACT_MV', 'ACC_USER_ALL_MV', 'BYT_TEL_INFO_ALL_MV', 'BYT_LS_FORM_ALL_MV', 'BYT_KNG_FORM_ALL_MV', 'PROM_ABONT_ALL_MV') AND last_refresh<sysdate-1
select trunc(dt_reg) dt,sum(cnt2)pok,sum(cnt) abont from report.byt_lkk_pok_mv where dt_reg > sysdate-120 group by trunc(dt_reg) order by trunc(dt_reg)
select trunc((dt_finish-a.DT_START)*24*60*60) sec,a.* from ec_mes.load_log a order by dt_start desc
select * from ec_mes.err_log order by dt desc
select nm_query,dt_load,sql_query from ec_mes.sql_store
select * from DBA_SCHEDULER_JOBS where owner = 'EC_MES' and job_name like 'RBT_BLK%'

select trunc(dt,'mi') dt, sum(crm) crm,sum(lkk)lkk, sum(plat) plat, sum(Mpgu) Mpgu, sum(lkk_mobile)lkk_mobile, sum(uzdo) uzdo,sum(Uk) Uk, sum(LkkJur) LkkJur,sum(Sms) Sms from ( select date_log dt, case when id_group =9 then 1 else 0 end crm, case when id_group =11 then 1 else 0 end lkk, case when id_group =19 then 1 else 0 end lkk_mobile, case when id_group =18 then 1 else 0 end plat, case when id_group =15 then 1 else 0 end uzdo, case when id_group =28 then 1 else 0 end LkkJur, case when id_group =24 then 1 else 0 end Uk, case when id_group =23 then 1 else 0 end Mpgu, case when id_group =22 then 1 else 0 end Sms, 1 tot from WS_LOGS.WS_LOG a,report.wd_sqlstore@gl3 b where date_log>sysdate-5/24/60 and a.nm_query=b.nm_query) group by trunc(dt,'mi')
